title: Australia's AGL makes $19 mln offer for regional telco
text:
Australia's AGL makes $19 mln offer for regional telco

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 10:42)

© Reuters. Australia's AGL makes $19 mln offer for regional telco Oct 16 (Reuters) - Australia's AGL Energy offered on Wednesday to buy local telecommunications provider Southern (NYSE: ) Phone Co Ltd for about A$27.5 million ($18.56 million), marking the electricity retailer's second foray into the telecom sector this year. AGL had earlier in the year made and backed out of two separate takeover attempts for telecom firm Vocus Ltd . ($1 = 1.4817 Australian dollars)

Australia's AGL makes $19 mln offer for regional telco
description: Australia's AGL makes $19 mln offer for regional telco
